extendedInfo.description: Huge new update(v1.2) is here adding a ton of requested features! Keep sending feedback and I'll keep updating the game. Thanks for the support!*****************Words in Bed is an addictive new word game which offers many ways to play, both online and offline. With some modes offering a breakneck pace while others are completely relaxed.Action Modes:* Infinite mode: Make the longest words you can find before the board fills up* Two minute challenge: Make long words to extend your time* Word search mode: Find the letters on the board as quickly as possible* Kids word search mode: uses a subset of easy words for kids to find and removes time limitRelaxed Modes:* Countdown mode: More letters and obstacles appear with every word you make* Puzzle mode: Over 40 hand-crafted puzzles to solveOnline Modes:* Daily challenge: A new puzzle every day* 5 minute challenge: Take on the world with a new puzzle every 5 minutes___________________________________________Features:* Lots of ways to play* Kid friendly mode* Cross-platform leaderboards for all modes* Over 40 achievements to be earned* Customizable colors

reviews.title: Recommended
reviews.comment: Cool twist on the matching game play model.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Addictive!
reviews.comment: Being scrabble and text twist fans we love this game! My wife is not a gamer or tech savy and she can\'t put it down! The only issue is the faulty \'resume game\' button.
reviews.author: A Google User
